Custom lead fields can be mapped to which sets of objects in salesforce.com?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. Account, Contact, or Opportunity

Custom lead fields in Salesforce can be mapped to Account, Contact, or Opportunity objects during the lead conversion process. This mapping allows data from custom lead fields to flow into corresponding fields on these objects when a lead is converted. So, the correct answer is:

B. Account, Contact, or Opportunity

"For each custom lead field, choose a custom account, contact, or opportunity field into which you want the information inserted when you convert a lead. In Lightning Experience, a custom lead field can map to account, contact, and opportunity fields at the same time."
